name: A boss day
description:
This is my game for the GMC Jam#8 - May 2018

WELCOME TO THE DUNGEON

You are a game boss and you have a monsters party tonight.
But before you have 4 fights with heroes planned for today.
And to be a good boss, you have to respect game patterns...

During a fight you have to follow a pattern using 'F','G','K' and 'L' keys.
The more precise you are, the more powerful you are, but the faster the pattern will go.
For each fight, you will have to learn a new pattern that will be more and more complicated throughout the day.

You have a power gauge on the right. When you fill it, you trigger a special attack.
You do damage and quickly increase your power in the green zone.

Do not press keys outside the zone and do not let them go out otherwise you risk depressing !
And it may boost the morale of the hero who will take a heal potion.

Have Fun !
